translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Regarding the mercury and powders of Joanes which Your Lordship Antônio Manuel Correia da Câmara, at the first opportune occasion, will send half of each item to the War Train in this capital, in order to fulfill the requisitions that different overseers of the state's sheepfolds make for these drugs.

God keep Your Lordship. Treasury Secretariat in Caçapava, March 15, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Collector of the Municipalities of Alegrete and São Borja. Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic

To the citizen Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Collector of the municipalities of São Borja and Alegrete. From the Ministry of the Treasury. March — 15 — 39. Almeida.
